alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:14PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Georgetown County through 200 PM EDT... At 114 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lambert, or 12 miles north of McClellanville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Pawleys Island, Murrells Inlet, Yawkey South Island, Winyah Bay Entrance, Andrews, North Santee, Oatland, Lambert, Sampit, Plantersville, Graves, Litchfield Beach, Waccamaw Community Hospital and Georgetown Memorial Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
